name: 01-Project Overview
content:
Churn Prediction classification problem


Objective:

Churn Prediction classification problem revolves around a sample sales transaction dataset. The objective is to predict customers who may churn based on their usage behaviour. Once identified Customer Retention program can be initiated for these customer.


Approach:

  • Utilize the SparkML and H2O machine learning model for classification.
  • Apply data analysis techniques to pre-process and explore the transaction dataset.
  • Develop a predictive model for churn classification.


Significance:

  • Improve the Customer Retention by extending various offers to customers.
  • Enhance the profitability by retaining customers.


Expected Outcomes:

  • Accurate predictions of customers who might churn using the SparkML and H2O ML models.
  • Informed decision-making for Customer Retention campaigns.


This project employs the SparkML and H2O classification ML model to address the customer churn classification challenge, utilizing advanced analytics and machine learning methodologies. The application of ML Models aims to provide accurate predictions and contribute to the optimization of the identification of churning customer and customer retention strategies.
